titles.title: A bill to extend the deadlines under the Federal Power Act applicable to a hydroelectric project in Pennsylvania, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S14113)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary: 10/4/1994--Introduced. Authorizes the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission, upon the request of specified licensees, to extend the time required to commence construction of a certain hydroelectric project in Pennsylvania.
